title: Bloomberg Markets: Hackers Holding Disney Movie Ransom
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Hackers Holding Disney Movie Ransom
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Chris Palmeri Bureau Chief:Los Angeles Bloomberg News Discussing hackers claiming to have stolen an unreleased Disney film and are threatening to distribute it online if they aren’t paid a ransom. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
